## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | This order size provides a safety buffer against demand variability and ensures sufficient stock for the forecasted 5 days. Using two 10,000 unit purchases aligns with the vendor's available quantities.  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  8,000 units higher than the player's planned purchase. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     |  3.4 days                                |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   |  5 days                                   |
| Comments                          |  The recommended order size avoids the discount threshold as the potential cost savings are insignificant compared to the risk of stockouts. The 20,000 unit purchase ensures a high coverage of the forecasted demand and provides a safety buffer for potential demand fluctuations. |
